group_1.narration: This is a little story from when we were in@Kamihama while the interiors of Mikazuki Villa@and Cafe LycoReco had been swapped.
After an exhausting day of being dragged@around by Chisato, I returned to Mikazuki Villa,@which had the interior of Cafe LycoReco.

group_1.textRight: Oh, welcome back, Takina.
You look tired today.

group_1.textLeft: Well…I've been out with Chisato the entire day.

group_1.textRight: Oh, that's funny, we were just talking about@you two.

group_1.textLeft: About…us?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you guys have different color uniforms,@right?
We were wondering if it meant you guys were@in different grades or something.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes… I'd liken it more to a difference@in rank.

group_1.narration: "LycoReco has a type of ranking system,@separated by our uniform colors.@A red uniform like Chisato's indicates First,@while my blue indicates Second."

group_1.textLeft: So to reiterate, in terms of rank,
Chisato's…is higher than mine.
She has a history of resolving major cases@in the past,
and she is well-known at headquarters for@being an excellent Lycoris.

group_1.textRight: She's quite something…
So you're tired of bein' with her 'cause of@how good she is?

group_1.textLeft: …No, it's because of how irresponsible she is.

group_1.textCenter: Takina! Let's go this way next!
Hey, c'mon, c'mooooon!@I'm gonna leave you behind!

group_1.textRight: Ahaha…@She's always so full of energy, isn't she?
I'm impressed you're able to keep up with her@even though you get so exhausted…
If I were you, I'd get so pissed I'd snap and@start fighting her.

group_1.textLeft: You'd…fight her, huh?
…I admit it isn't enjoyable for me to be always@at her whim.
But even if I tried fighting back,@I doubt I'd stand a chance…

group_1.textRight: Is there anything you can beat her in, then?
Just somethin' you can do better than her@that makes her go "I can't believe this!"

group_1.textLeft: "I can't believe this…"
…That would be something.
But how do I go about it? If we worked in@separate fields, it would be easier…
I'd rather avoid any and all forms of combat…

group_1.textRight: Competition isn't just about fighting!
Take studying, for example!@You seem like you'd be great at it!

group_1.textLeft: The DA gives us the same education, so there's@little distinction between us…

group_1.textRight: Huh?! Chisato's smart?@She sure doesn't look like it…
Then maybe there's something you're better at@that she'd never see coming?
Something like that might lead to a "I can't@believe this?!" moment.

group_1.textLeft: In other words, something that would completely@transform her perception of me…
…Cooking could be an example.
If I were to surprise her by putting together@the perfect meal for our team,
that could possibly astonish her.

group_1.textRight: Yep yep! That sounds like a great idea!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, and perhaps…if I learn more about films,
that would also be likely to leave her shocked@and amazed.
…And when it comes to art, well, that's a battle@already won.

group_1.textRight: Wait, you're good at drawing?@Lemme see, lemme see!

group_1.textLeft: I'm certainly no artist, but when it comes@to Chisato, there's no competition.
I think I left it on the counter…
…There they are.
The one on the right is Chisato's, while the one@on the left is mine.

group_1.textRight: Oh…I…see…@It's got its own charm, I guess?
You're both so bad at this it's like being on@the horns of a cow.
On the horns of a dilemma, Felicia.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:406201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh no…

group_1.textRight: No prob! You just gotta add art to your trainin',@that's all!

group_1.textLeft: Eh? You really think that's necessary?

group_1.textRight: If you wanna surprise Chisato, there's gotta be@an actual difference between your art, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: I see, that makes sense. Everything is starting@to piece together!

group_1.textRight: I didn't expect you'd be so into this…

group_1.textLeft: I'm not averse to training and improving@my capabilities.
That said, I'll need somebody to teach me…

group_1.textRight: Oh, then maybe you could talk to Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: Right, she'd be able to help.
She has connections with various experts@around Kamihama City.

group_1.textRight: Shoot, Felicia and I need to man the deck at@Banbanzai now…
Then Yachiyo and I can take you to her!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I would be grateful if you did.
So you want to meet some experts in cooking,@painting, and film…
I know just who to ask!
